result.eng: Life was different then in the sense that we didn't have modern-day facilities.
result.ga: Bhí an saol difriúil ag an am sa mhéid nach raibh áiseanna na linne seo againn
result.orig: Bhí an saol difriúil ag an am sa mhéid nach raibh áiseanna na linne seo againn
result.html: Bhí an saol difriúil ag an am sa mhéid nach raibh áiseanna na linne seo againnLife was different then in the sense that we didn't have modern-day facilities.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an saol difriúil ag an am sa ṁéid naċ raiḃ áiseanna na linne seo againnLife was different then in the sense that we didn't have modern-day facilities.

result.eng: Put those things in order according to size.
result.ga: Cuir na rudaí sin in ord de réir méide
result.orig: Cuir na rudaí sin in ord de réir méide

result.ponchtml: Cuir na rudaí sin in ord de réir méidePut those things in order according to size.

result.html: Cén mhéid atá ionat anoisWhat size are you now?
result.ponchtml: Cén ṁéid atá ionat anoisWhat size are you now?

result.eng: Because of the amount of information available.
result.ga: De bharr an méid eolais atá le fáil
result.orig: De bharr an méid eolais atá le fáil
result.html: De bharr an méid eolais atá le fáilBecause of the amount of information available.
result.ponchtml: De ḃarr an méid eolais atá le fáilBecause of the amount of information available.

result.eng: Half of that amount would do.
result.ga: Dhéanfadh leath an méid sin cúis
result.orig: Dhéanfadh leath an méid sin cúis
result.html: Dhéanfadh leath an méid sin cúisHalf of that amount would do.
result.ponchtml: Ḋéanfaḋ leaṫ an méid sin cúisHalf of that amount would do.

result.eng: The number of university students is growing.
result.ga: Tá líon na mac léinn ollscoile ag dul i méid

result.eng: The number of applications is increasing.

result.eng: The number of complaints is increasing.

result.html: Tá siad ar aon mhéidThey are the same size.
result.ponchtml: Tá siad ar aon ṁéidThey are the same size.

result.eng: Do you play snooker? No I don't. The odd game of pool in the pub, that's all.
result.ga: An mbíonn tú ag imirt snúcair Ní bhím Corrchluiche púil sa bpub sin an méid
result.orig: An mbíonn tú ag imirt snúcair Ní bhím Corrchluiche púil sa bpub sin an méid

result.eng: There are both facts and judgement in what I have just said. I stand behind them both.
result.ga: Tá idir fhíricí agus bhreithiúnas sa mhéid sin Seasaim leo araon

result.eng: Jamie was left among a pack of other children who were about his own size.
result.ga: Fágadh Séimí i gcuideachta scaifte eile páistí a bhí fána thuairim féin méide
result.orig: Fágadh Séimí i gcuideachta scaifte eile páistí a bhí fána thuairim féin méide

result.ponchtml: Fágaḋ Séimí i gcuideaċta scaifte eile páistí a ḃí fána ṫuairim féin méideJamie was left among a pack of other children who were about his own size.

result.eng: She is tiny and weighs nothing.
result.html: Níl méid nó meáchan intiShe is tiny and weighs nothing.
result.ponchtml: Níl méid nó meáċan intiShe is tiny and weighs nothing.
